name: Freshly Frosted
description: Solve puzzles in the world's most adorable donut factory. Assemble conveyor belts to guide your donuts between haphazardly placed topping stations and deliver your line of delicious desserts.Puzzling PerfectionThink outside the donut box as you build increasingly complex cuisine machines.A Dozen DozenFreshly Frosted delivers 12 unique worlds, each with 12 levels and unique mechanics, contraptions, and confections.Satisfaction GuaranteedYour donut factories are just as satisfying to watch in-motion as they are to build, and you'll be dancing to the upbeat soundtrack.
